TextView.android:text: Uttarakhand (The Land Of Gods ) invites you to experience the most exuberant tourism of your life . The land in the laps of Himalayas offers something for every person out there Pilgrimage, Temples, Wildlife tours, Bird Watching, Rafting, Mountaineering, Skiiing, Trekking, Camping, Yoga ,Meditation and much more Do visit the heaven before visiting earth .
